content:
TITLE: Installing unplugin-typia and Typia
DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing the unplugin-typia package and setting up Typia in a project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/blob/main/packages/unplugin-typia/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# npm
npm install -D @ryoppippi/unplugin-typia

# install typia! (nypm detects your PM ✨)
npx nypm add typia

# setup typia!
npx typia setup
# pnpm dlx typia setup
# yarn dlx typia setup

# after installing typia, run prepare script
npm run prepare
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Vite with unplugin-typia
DESCRIPTION: Example configuration for using unplugin-typia with Vite bundler in a TypeScript project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
// vite.config.ts
import UnpluginTypia from '@ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/vite';

export default defineConfig({
	plugins: [
		UnpluginTypia({ tsconfig: './tsconfig.app.json' /* options */ }), // should be placed before other plugins like `react`, `svetle`, etc.
	],
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring unplugin-typia with Vite
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to add unplugin-typia to a Vite configuration file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/blob/main/packages/unplugin-typia/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
// vite.config.ts
import UnpluginTypia from '@ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/vite';

export default defineConfig({
	plugins: [
		UnpluginTypia({ tsconfig: './tsconfig.app.json' /* options */ }), // should be placed before other plugins like `react`, `svetle`, etc.
	],
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing unplugin-typia and Typia with npm
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install unplugin-typia and Typia using npm, including setup and preparation steps.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# npm
npm install -D @ryoppippi/unplugin-typia

# install typia! (nypm detects your PM ✨)
npx nypm add typia

# setup typia!
npx typia setup
# pnpm dlx typia setup
# yarn dlx typia setup

# after installing typia, run prepare script
npm run prepare
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring unplugin-typia with Next.js
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to add unplugin-typia to a Next.js configuration file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/blob/main/packages/unplugin-typia/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// next.config.mjs
import unTypiaNext from 'unplugin-typia/next';

/** @type {import('next').NextConfig} */
const nextConfig = { /* your next.js config */};

/** @type {import("unplugin-typia").Options} */
const unpluginTypiaOptions = { /* your unplugin-typia options */ };

export default unTypiaNext(nextConfig, unpluginTypiaOptions);

// you can omit the unplugin-typia options when you don't need to customize it
// export default unTypiaNext(nextConfig);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Next.js with unplugin-typia
DESCRIPTION: Example configuration for using unplugin-typia with Next.js framework in a JavaScript project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// next.config.mjs
import unTypiaNext from 'unplugin-typia/next';

/** @type {import('next').NextConfig} */
const nextConfig = { /* your next.js config */};

/** @type {import("unplugin-typia").Options} */
const unpluginTypiaOptions = { /* your unplugin-typia options */ };

export default unTypiaNext(nextConfig, unpluginTypiaOptions);

// you can omit the unplugin-typia options when you don't need to customize it
// export default unTypiaNext(nextConfig);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring unplugin-typia with Webpack
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to add unplugin-typia to a Webpack configuration file, including setup for different Node.js versions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/blob/main/packages/unplugin-typia/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// webpack.config.js

// if you use Node < 20.17.0
const jiti = require('jiti')(__filename);
const { default: UnpluginTypia } = jiti('@ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/webpack');

// if you use Node >= 20.17.0
// const { default: UnpluginTypia } = require("@ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/webpack");

module.exports = {
	plugins: [
		UnpluginTypia({ /* options */ }),
	],
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Webpack with unplugin-typia
DESCRIPTION: Example configuration for using unplugin-typia with Webpack bundler in a JavaScript project, including setup for different Node.js versions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// webpack.config.js

// if you use Node < 20.17.0
const jiti = require('jiti')(__filename);
const { default: UnpluginTypia } = jiti('@ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/webpack');

// if you use Node >= 20.17.0
// const { default: UnpluginTypia } = require("@ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/webpack");

module.exports = {
	plugins: [
		UnpluginTypia({ /* options */ }),
	],
};
```

TITLE: Configuring unplugin-typia with Bun.build
DESCRIPTION: Examples of how to use unplugin-typia with Bun.build for building and running scripts.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/blob/main/packages/unplugin-typia/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
// build.ts
import UnpluginTypia from '@ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/bun';

await Bun.build({
	entrypoints: ['./index.ts'],
	outdir: './out',
	plugins: [
		UnpluginTypia({ /* your options */})
	]
});
```

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
// preload.ts
import { plugin } from 'bun';
import UnpluginTypia from '@ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/bun';

plugin(UnpluginTypia({ /* your options */}));
```

LANGUAGE: toml
CODE:
```
# bun.toml
preload = "preload.ts"

[test]
preload = "preload.ts"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Bun.build with unplugin-typia
DESCRIPTION: Example configuration for using unplugin-typia with Bun.build for building scripts in a TypeScript project.

LANGUAGE: typescript

```
// build.ts

await Bun.build({
	entrypoints: ['./index.ts'],
	outdir: './out',
	plugins: [
		UnpluginTypia({ /* your options */})
	]
});
```

LANGUAGE: toml

TITLE: Installing and Running Unplugin-typia Next.js Example
DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing dependencies, preparing the project, running the development server, and building the project. These steps are essential for setting up and testing the unplugin-typia integration with Next.js.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/blob/main/examples/nextjs/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: txt
CODE:
```
bun i && bun prepare
bun run dev
bun run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Testing API with xh
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to make a POST request to the deployed API using xh, a command-line HTTP client. This command sends a POST request with 'name' and 'age' parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ryoppippi/unplugin-typia/blob/main/examples/vite-hono/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
xh post https://unplugin-typia-vite-hono.pages.dev/ name=john age:=27
```
